entry.title: Basic Electricity 1 - Section 3-7: Kirchhoff's Current Law / 克希荷夫電流定律（3-7）
entry.content:
Basic Electricity 1 - Section 3-7: Kirchhoff’s Current Law

Key Points

  • Kirchhoff’s Current Law (KCL): At any node in an electrical circuit, the total current entering equals the total current leaving.
  • Formula:
    $$
    \sum I_{\text{in}} = \sum I_{\text{out}}
    $$
    or algebraic sum equals zero:
    $$
    \sum I = 0
    $$
  • The algebraic sum of currents at a node (inflows positive, outflows negative) is zero.
  • Use examples to calculate currents and find unknown values.
  • In parallel circuits, node currents conserve and voltages are equal.
  • Examples include calculating currents and resistances to verify KCL.

磨課師基本電學1 3-7 克希荷夫電流定律

重點歸納

  • 克希荷夫電流定律 (KCL)：在電路中任一節點，流入的總電流等於流出的總電流。
  • 公式表示：
    $$
    \sum I_{\text{流入}} = \sum I_{\text{流出}}
    $$
    或代數和為零：
    $$
    \sum I = 0
    $$
  • 節點電流的代數和（流入為正，流出為負）等於零。
  • 透過實例計算節點電流，求出未知電流值。
  • 並聯電路中，節點電流守恆，電壓相等。
  • 實例中計算電流和電阻，驗證KCL定律。

entry.content:
2-4.1 Ohm’s Law Practice Examples

Summary

  • Ohm’s Law formula:
    $$ R = \frac{V}{I} $$
    Resistance (R) equals voltage (V) divided by current (I).

  • Example explanations:

    • Select points from voltage-current graph and calculate resistance using Ohm’s law.
    • Voltage difference calculation: (V_{AB} = V_A - V_B).
    • Current flows from higher to lower potential.
    • Current magnitude calculation:
      $$ I = \frac{V_{AB}}{R} $$

  • Resistor and heating wire example:

    • Heating wire resistance is 20 ohms, voltage 110V, current 5.5A.
    • When the wire length is halved, resistance halves, current doubles to 11A.
    • Increased current may cause the wire to burn out.

  • Multiple resistor current calculation:

    • Use node voltages to find voltage differences across resistors.
    • Apply the same current formula.

Reference Video

You can enable YouTube auto-translation by turning on “Subtitles” and selecting “Auto-translate” in the video settings.

2-4.1 歐姆定律範例練習

重點歸納

  • 歐姆定律公式：
    $$ R = \frac{V}{I} $$
    電阻 (R) 等於電壓 (V) 除以電流 (I)。

  • 例題說明：

    • 從電壓與電流圖中選點，代入歐姆定律計算電阻值。
    • 電位差計算：兩點電位差 (V_{AB} = V_A - V_B)。
    • 電流方向由高電位流向低電位。
    • 電流大小計算：
      $$ I = \frac{V_{AB}}{R} $$

  • 電阻與電熱絲例題：

    • 電熱絲電阻為20歐姆，110伏特電壓，電流為5.5安培。
    • 電熱絲長度減半，電阻減半，電流變為11安培。
    • 電流增大可能導致電熱絲燒毀。

  • 多電阻電流計算：

    • 利用節點電位差計算各電阻電流。
    • 電流計算公式同上。

entry.title: Basic Electricity 1 - Parallel Circuit Definition and Characteristics / 並聯電路定義及特性
entry.content:
Basic Electricity 1 - Parallel Circuit Definition and Characteristics

Key Points

  1. Definition: A parallel circuit consists of two or more components, where one end of each component is connected together and the other end is also connected together.
  2. Characteristics:
    • Equal Voltage: The voltage across all components is the same.
    • Independence: If one component fails, it does not affect the operation of other components.
    • Total Resistance: The formula for total resistance ( R_T ) is:
      $$
      \frac{1}{R_T} = \frac{1}{R_1} + \frac{1}{R_2} + \cdots + \frac{1}{R_n}
      $$
    • Conductance: The total conductance ( G_T ) is the sum of the conductances of each branch.

Reference Video

YouTube Video: Parallel Circuit Definition and Characteristics

You can enable YouTube auto-translation by turning on “Subtitles” and selecting “Auto-translate” in the video settings.

並聯電路定義及特性

重點歸納

  1. 定義：並聯電路由兩個或以上元件組成，所有元件的一端相連，另一端也相連。
  2. 特性：
    • 電壓相等：所有元件的電壓相同。
    • 獨立性：某一元件斷路不影響其他元件的運作。
    • 總電阻：總電阻 ( R_T ) 計算公式為：
      $$
      \frac{1}{R_T} = \frac{1}{R_1} + \frac{1}{R_2} + \cdots + \frac{1}{R_n}
      $$
    • 電導：總電導 ( G_T ) 為各支路電導之和。

entry.content:
3-5 Examples of Series Circuit Applications

Key Points Summary

  • Voltmeter and Multiplier: The voltmeter measures a fixed voltage; adding a series multiplier resistor extends the measurement range.
  • Multiplier Principle: Series resistors adjust voltage division, allowing the voltmeter to measure higher voltages.
  • Multiplier Ratio Calculation: The multiplier ratio is the ratio of total measured voltage ( V_T ) to the voltmeter’s original voltage ( V_V ).
  • Example Calculation:
    • To measure 100V with a 10V full-scale voltmeter, a 9KΩ resistor is connected in series.
    • Multi-range voltmeters (10V, 100V, 250V) use different series resistors (9.9KΩ, 90KΩ, 150KΩ) to achieve measurement.
  • Ammeter Multiplier: Similar to the voltmeter, series resistors extend the measurement range.
  • Role of Series Resistors: Solve the problem of limited measurement range by voltage division.

Reference Video

You can enable YouTube auto-translation by turning on “Subtitles” and selecting “Auto-translate” in the video settings.

3-5 串聯電路應用實例

重點歸納

  • 電壓表與倍增器：電壓表量測固定電壓，串聯倍增器（電阻）可擴大量測範圍。
  • 倍增器原理：串聯電阻調整電壓分壓，讓電壓表能量測更高電壓。
  • 倍增率計算：倍增率 = 待測總電壓 VT 與電壓表原始量測電壓 VV 的比值。
  • 實例計算：
    • 量測100伏特時，10伏特滿刻度電壓表需串聯9K歐姆電阻。
    • 多範圍電壓表（10V、100V、250V）透過串聯不同電阻（9.9K、90K、150K歐姆）達成量測。
  • 安培表倍增器：類似電壓表，透過串聯電阻擴大量測範圍。
  • 串聯電阻的作用：解決量測範圍不足的問題，透過分壓原理實現。

entry.content:
Title

DC Network Analysis: Basics and Problem-Solving Steps of Node Voltage Method (Part A)

Key Points Summary:

  • Node Definition: A point where two or more components connect.
  • Reference Node: Set as zero potential (ground).
  • Kirchhoff’s Current Law (KCL): The sum of currents entering a node equals the sum leaving it.
  • Ohm’s Law: Voltage across a resistor equals current times resistance.
  • Node Voltage Method Steps:
    1. Set reference node (0V).
    2. Label unknown node voltages.
    3. Assume current directions and label them.
    4. Write KCL equations.
    5. Use Ohm’s law to express currents.
    6. Substitute into KCL equations.
    7. Solve for unknown node voltages.
    8. Substitute back to find branch currents.
  • Negative Current: Indicates opposite direction to assumed.
  • Verification: Check current conservation.

標題

直流網路分析：節點電壓法基礎與解題步驟（Part A）

重點歸納

  • 節點定義：兩個或以上元件連接的點。
  • 參考節點：設為零電位（接地點）。
  • 克希荷夫電流定律 (KCL)：任一節點流入電流總和等於流出電流總和。
  • 歐姆定律：電阻兩端電壓差等於電流乘以電阻。
  • 節點電壓法步驟：
    1. 設定參考節點（0V）。
    2. 標示未知節點電壓。
    3. 假設電流方向並標示。
    4. 寫出KCL方程式。
    5. 利用歐姆定律寫出電流算式。
    6. 代入KCL方程式。
    7. 解方程式求未知節點電壓。
    8. 代回求各支路電流。
  • 電流負號意義：方向與假設相反。
  • 驗算：確認電流守恆。

entry.title: Analysis and Application of Delta (Δ) to Y-Shape Circuit Conversion - 三角形(Δ)轉換為Y形電路解析與應用
entry.content:
Title

Analysis and Application of Delta (Δ) to Y-Shape Circuit Conversion

Key Points:

  • The formula for converting delta resistors to Y resistors is:
    $$
    R_a = \frac{R_{12} \times R_{13}}{R_{12} + R_{23} + R_{13}}, \quad
    R_b = \frac{R_{12} \times R_{23}}{R_{12} + R_{23} + R_{13}}, \quad
    R_c = \frac{R_{23} \times R_{13}}{R_{12} + R_{23} + R_{13}}
    $$
  • Overlaying circuit diagrams helps in calculation and understanding.
  • Conversion simplifies complex circuits for easier total resistance and current calculation.
  • When the Wheatstone bridge is unbalanced, delta-Y conversion is necessary.
  • Example results: Ra=1Ω, Rb=2Ω, Rc=2Ω, with total resistance and current calculated.
  • Advanced problems use delta-to-Y conversion and comparison to solve unknown resistors.

標題

三角形(Δ)轉換為Y形電路解析與應用

重點歸納

  • 三角形電阻轉換為Y形電阻，計算公式為：
    $$
    R_a = \frac{R_{12} \times R_{13}}{R_{12} + R_{23} + R_{13}}, \quad
    R_b = \frac{R_{12} \times R_{23}}{R_{12} + R_{23} + R_{13}}, \quad
    R_c = \frac{R_{23} \times R_{13}}{R_{12} + R_{23} + R_{13}}
    $$
  • 透過重疊電路圖，方便計算與理解轉換關係。
  • 轉換後可簡化複雜電路，方便計算總電阻與總電流。
  • 惠斯登電橋不平衡時，必須使用三角形與Y形互換法。
  • 實例中計算出Ra=1Ω，Rb=2Ω，Rc=2Ω，並求出總電阻與總電流。
  • 進階題型中，利用三角形轉Y形後，透過比對求解未知電阻。

entry.title: Y-Δ Transformation Method (Y to Delta Conversion) - Y形變三角形互換法（Y-Δ變換法）
entry.content:
Title

Y-Δ Transformation Method (Y to Delta Conversion)

Key Points Summary:

  • Y and Delta resistor networks can be converted into each other; this section focuses on converting Y to Delta.
  • Y resistors are labeled Ra, Rb, Rc; Delta resistors are R1, R2, R3.
  • Y to Delta formula:
    $$ R_{ riangle} = \frac{\text{Sum of products of pairs of Y resistors}}{\text{Opposite Y resistor}} $$
  • The sum of products of pairs is: (Ra \times Rb + Rb \times Rc + Rc \times Ra).
  • Each Delta resistor is calculated by dividing this sum by the Y resistor opposite to it.
  • In practice, calculate the sum once and apply it to all three Delta resistors.
  • This method simplifies complex circuits for easier total resistance calculation.

標題

Y形變三角形互換法（Y-Δ變換法）

重點歸納

  • Y形與三角形電阻可以互換，本單元重點是Y形轉三角形的計算方法。
  • Y形電阻標為Ra, Rb, Rc，三角形電阻標為R1, R2, R3。
  • Y轉三角形公式：
    $$ R_{ riangle} = \frac{\text{Y形電阻兩兩相乘之和}}{\text{對邊的Y形電阻}} $$
  • 兩兩相乘之和為：(Ra \times Rb + Rb \times Rc + Rc \times Ra)。
  • R1、R2、R3分別除以離它最遠的Y形電阻。
  • 實務計算中，兩兩相乘之和只需算一次，後續套用即可。
  • 透過此法則可將複雜電路化簡，方便計算總電阻。

entry.title: Thevenin's Theorem: Practical Examples - 戴維寧定理：實際例題
entry.content:
Example 1: Simple Circuit

Let’s analyze a simple circuit using Thevenin’s Theorem.

Circuit Description

  • Voltage source: V = 10V
  • Resistors: R1 = 2Ω, R2 = 3Ω, R3 = 4Ω
  • Load resistor: RL = 5Ω

Solution Steps

  1. Find Thevenin Voltage (Vth)
    • Remove RL
    • Calculate open circuit voltage
    • Vth = 6V
  2. Find Thevenin Resistance (Rth)
    • Turn off voltage source
    • Calculate equivalent resistance
    • Rth = 2.4Ω
  3. Final Equivalent Circuit
    • Vth = 6V
    • Rth = 2.4Ω
    • RL = 5Ω

Example 2: Complex Circuit

Analyze a more complex circuit with multiple sources.

Circuit Description

  • Voltage sources: V1 = 12V, V2 = 6V
  • Current source: I = 2A
  • Resistors: R1 = 4Ω, R2 = 6Ω, R3 = 8Ω
  • Load resistor: RL = 10Ω

Solution Steps

  1. Find Thevenin Voltage (Vth)
    • Use superposition theorem
    • Calculate contributions from each source
    • Vth = 8V
  2. Find Thevenin Resistance (Rth)
    • Turn off all sources
    • Calculate equivalent resistance
    • Rth = 3.2Ω
  3. Final Equivalent Circuit
    • Vth = 8V
    • Rth = 3.2Ω
    • RL = 10Ω

例題一：簡單電路

讓我們使用戴維寧定理分析一個簡單電路。

電路描述

  • 電壓源：V = 10V
  • 電阻：R1 = 2Ω，R2 = 3Ω，R3 = 4Ω
  • 負載電阻：RL = 5Ω

解題步驟

  1. 求戴維寧電壓（Vth）
    • 移除RL
    • 計算開路電壓
    • Vth = 6V
  2. 求戴維寧電阻（Rth）
    • 關閉電壓源
    • 計算等效電阻
    • Rth = 2.4Ω
  3. 最終等效電路
    • Vth = 6V
    • Rth = 2.4Ω
    • RL = 5Ω

例題二：複雜電路

分析一個包含多個電源的複雜電路。

電路描述

  • 電壓源：V1 = 12V，V2 = 6V
  • 電流源：I = 2A
  • 電阻：R1 = 4Ω，R2 = 6Ω，R3 = 8Ω
  • 負載電阻：RL = 10Ω

解題步驟

  1. 求戴維寧電壓（Vth）
    • 使用重疊定理
    • 計算各電源的貢獻
    • Vth = 8V
  2. 求戴維寧電阻（Rth）
    • 關閉所有電源
    • 計算等效電阻
    • Rth = 3.2Ω
  3. 最終等效電路
    • Vth = 8V
    • Rth = 3.2Ω
    • RL = 10Ω

entry.content:

This article introduces the fundamental concepts of magnetism, including magnet types, magnetic poles, and the characteristics of magnetic fields and field lines.

本文介紹磁學的基本概念，包括磁鐵類型、磁極以及磁場和磁力線的特性。

English

  • Introduction to Magnets

    • Magnets attract iron objects
    • Two types: natural and artificial
    • Essential in electromagnetism

  • Magnet Poles

    • North (N) pole: usually red
    • South (S) pole: black or dark blue
    • Clear visual identification

  • Magnet Characteristics

    • Strongest magnetic force at poles
    • N pole points to Earth’s magnetic north
    • S pole points to Earth’s magnetic south
    • Poles always exist in pairs
    • Like poles repel, opposite poles attract

  • Magnetic Field and Field Lines

    • Field: space where magnetic forces act
    • Lines run from N to S pole

    • Perpendicular to magnet surface
    • Never cross each other

中文

  • 磁鐵介紹

    • 能吸引鐵器
    • 分為天然和人造兩種
    • 電磁學基礎元件

  • 磁鐵特性

    • S極指向地磁南極
    • 磁極總是成對出現

entry.title: Charged Particle Motion in Magnetic Fields: Force and Trajectory Analysis - 電荷在磁場中運動的受力與運動軌跡解析
entry.content:
Introduction 引言

This article explores the fundamental principles of charged particle motion in magnetic fields, including the Lorentz force, trajectory analysis, and practical applications.

本文探討電荷在磁場中運動的基本原理，包括洛倫茲力、運動軌跡分析以及實際應用。

Key Points 重點歸納

1. Lorentz Force and Direction 洛倫茲力與方向

  • A charged particle moving in a magnetic field experiences the Lorentz force, whose direction is determined by Fleming’s left-hand rule.

  • The direction of positive charge movement is the current direction; with the magnetic field directed into the plane, the force is perpendicular to both velocity and magnetic field.

  • 電荷在磁場中運動時會受到洛倫茲力作用，力的方向可用佛萊明左手定則判斷。

  • 正電荷運動方向為電流方向，磁場方向垂直紙面射入，受力方向垂直於速度與磁場方向。

2. Circular Motion 圓周運動

  • Positive charges undergo counterclockwise circular motion in the magnetic field, while negative charges move clockwise.

  • The force magnitude is given by ( F = B Q v ), where ( B ) is magnetic flux density, ( Q ) is charge, and ( v ) is velocity.

  • 電荷在磁場中會做逆時針圓周運動（正電荷），負電荷則為順時針圓周運動。

entry.title: Introduction to Coulomb's Magnetic Force Law and Magnetic Field Intensity - 庫侖磁力定律與磁場強度介紹
entry.content:
Introduction

This article explains Coulomb’s magnetic force law and its relationship with magnetic field intensity, including the mathematical formulas and practical applications in electromagnetism.

Key Points

  • Basic Concepts

    • Coulomb’s magnetic force law is analogous to Newton’s law of universal gravitation

    • Magnetic force magnitude is proportional to the product of magnetic pole strengths

    • Force is inversely proportional to the square of the distance

    • Magnetic force formula:
      $$ F = K \frac{M_1 M_2}{d^2} $$
      where:

      • F: magnetic force
      • M₁, M₂: magnetic pole strengths
      • d: distance between poles
      • K: magnetic force constant

    • Magnetic pole strength unit is Weber (Wb)

    • Magnetic force constant in air/vacuum: K = 6.33 × 10⁴ (includes Henry)

  • Magnetic Field Intensity (H)

    • Magnetic field intensity is force per unit magnetic pole:
      $$ H = \frac{F}{m} $$
      where:

      • F: force
      • m: magnetic pole strength

    • Magnetic field intensity is a vector quantity

    • Direction follows magnetic field line tangent

  • 磁場強度（H）

Introduction 引言

This article analyzes the relationships between coupling coefficient, self-inductance, and mutual inductance in electromagnetic systems. It explains the fundamental concepts and mathematical relationships that govern these interactions.

本文分析電磁系統中耦合係數、自感和互感之間的關係。內容解釋這些相互作用的基本概念和數學關係。

Key Points 重點歸納

1. Coupling Coefficient 耦合係數

  • Coupling coefficient K:

    • Represents the magnetic coupling efficiency between two coils
    • Ranges from 0 to 1
    • Closer to 1 indicates better coupling

  • 耦合係數K：

    • 表示兩線圈間磁通的導磁效率
    • 範圍為0到1
    • 越接近1表示耦合越好

2. Coupling Efficiencies 耦合效率

  • K1 and K2:

    • K1: Magnetic coupling efficiency from coil 1 to coil 2
    • K2: Magnetic coupling efficiency from coil 2 to coil 1
    • K1 = K2 in practice

  • K1與K2：

    • K1：線圈1對線圈2磁通的導磁效率
    • K2：線圈2對線圈1的導磁效率
    • 實際應用中K1 = K2

3. Magnetic Flux 磁通量

  • Magnetic flux relationships:

    • Φ12: Magnetic flux from coil 1 affecting coil 2
    • Φ21: Magnetic flux from coil 2 affecting coil 1

  • 磁通關係：

    • Φ12：線圈1產生影響線圈2的磁通
    • Φ21：線圈2影響線圈1的磁通

4. Self-Inductance 自感量

  • Self-inductance values:

    • L1: Inductance of coil 1
    • L2: Inductance of coil 2

  • 自感量：

    • L1：線圈1的電感量
    • L2：線圈2的電感量

5. Mutual Inductance 互感量

  • Mutual inductance formula:
    [
    M = K \sqrt{L_1 L_2}
    ]

  • Equality of mutual inductances:
    [
    M_{12} = M_{21} = M
    ]

  • 互感量公式：
    [
    M = K \sqrt{L_1 L_2}
    ]

  • 互感量相等關係：
    [
    M_{12} = M_{21} = M
    ]

entry.title: Direction of Force on Current-Carrying Conductor in Magnetic Field and Fleming's Left-Hand Rule - 載流導體在磁場中所受力的方向與佛萊明左手定則
entry.content:
Introduction 引言

This article explains the principles of force direction on current-carrying conductors in magnetic fields and the application of Fleming’s left-hand rule, including magnetic field interactions and practical applications.

本文解釋載流導體在磁場中受力方向的原理和佛萊明左手定則的應用，包括磁場相互作用和實際應用。

Key Points 重點歸納

1. Current-Carrying Conductor and Magnetic Field 載流導體與磁場

  • Current-Carrying Conductor: A conductor with electric current generates a magnetic field.

  • Main Magnetic Field Direction: Magnetic lines run from the North (N) pole to the South (S) pole.

  • 載流導體：導體中通有電流，會產生磁場。

  • 主極磁場方向：磁力線由N極指向S極。

2. Magnetic Field Interactions 磁場相互作用

  • Interaction of Magnetic Lines:

    • Above the conductor, magnetic lines oppose and weaken each other.
    • Below the conductor, magnetic lines align and strengthen.

  • Force Direction: The conductor is pushed from regions of higher magnetic line density to lower density, resulting in an upward force.

  • 磁力線互動：

    • 導體上方磁力線方向相反，磁力線抵銷，磁場減弱。
    • 導體下方磁力線方向相同，磁力線增強。

  • 受力方向：導體受力由磁力線密度高處推向低處，導體向上受力。

3. Fleming’s Left-Hand Rule 佛萊明左手定則

  • Fleming’s Left-Hand Rule:

    • Thumb: Force direction (F)
    • Index finger: Magnetic field direction (B)
    • Middle finger: Current direction (I)
    • All three are perpendicular; use the left hand to determine the force direction on the conductor.

  • Application: Fleming’s left-hand rule simplifies determining the force direction on a current-carrying conductor in a magnetic field.

  • 佛萊明左手定則：

    • 拇指：受力方向（F）
    • 食指：磁場方向（B）
    • 中指：電流方向（I）
    • 三者互相垂直，用左手判斷載流導體受力方向。

  • 應用：佛萊明左手定則簡化判斷載流導體在磁場中受力方向的過程。

entry.content:
Introduction 引言

This article examines the calculation of force magnitude on a current-carrying conductor in a magnetic field, including both perpendicular and angled cases, along with practical examples.

本文探討載流導體在磁場中受力大小的計算方法，包括垂直和斜角兩種情況，並提供實際範例。

Key Points 重點歸納

1. Force Calculation Methods 受力計算方法

  • The force magnitude on a current-carrying conductor in a magnetic field is calculated in two cases:

    1. Conductor perpendicular to magnetic field:
      Formula: ( F = B l I )
      where ( F ) is force (Newtons), ( B ) is magnetic flux density (Tesla), ( l ) is effective length of conductor in the field (meters), and ( I ) is current (Amperes).
    2. Conductor at an angle (\theta) to magnetic field:
      Formula: ( F = B l I \sin \theta ), where (\sin \theta) adjusts the effective length cut by the magnetic field.

  • 載流導體在磁場中受力的大小計算分兩種情況：

    1. 導體與磁場垂直：
      公式為 ( F = B l I )
      其中，
      • ( F ) 是受力大小（牛頓，N）
      • ( B ) 是磁通密度（特斯拉，T）
      • ( l ) 是導體在磁場中的有效長度（公尺，m）
      • ( I ) 是電流大小（安培，A）
    2. 導體與磁場不垂直（與磁場成角度 (\theta)）：
      公式修正為 ( F = B l I \sin \theta )，其中 (\sin \theta) 是導體在磁場中切割的有效長度比例。

2. Force Direction 力的方向

  • The force direction is determined by Fleming’s left-hand rule:
    Thumb points to force, index finger to magnetic field, middle finger to current.

  • 力的方向可用佛萊明左手定則判斷：
    拇指指向力的方向，食指指向磁場方向，中指指向電流方向。

3. Example Calculations 範例計算

  • Example calculations:

    • Perpendicular case: ( B=2,T, l=1,m, I=10,A \Rightarrow F=20,N )
    • Angled case: ( B=0.5,T, l=0.2,m, I=10,A, \theta=30^\circ \Rightarrow F=0.5,N )

entry.content:
Introduction 引言

This article presents various examples of Faraday’s electromagnetic induction law, including basic problems, self-inductance calculations, and magnetic flux density applications.

本文介紹法拉第電磁感應定律的各種範例，包括基本題型、自感計算和磁通密度應用。

Key Points 重點歸納

1. Basic Faraday’s Law Problem 法拉第電磁感應基本題型

  • Key parameters: number of coil turns (N), change in magnetic flux (\Delta \Phi), and time interval (\Delta t).

  • Induced EMF formula:
    $$
    e = N \frac{\Delta \Phi}{\Delta t}
    $$

  • Example: 5000 turns, flux changes from 0.01Wb to 0.03Wb in 0.5s, EMF = 200V.

  • 線圈匝數 (N)、磁通變化量 (\Delta \Phi)、時間間隔 (\Delta t) 是計算感應電勢的關鍵參數。

  • 感應電勢公式：
    $$
    e = N \frac{\Delta \Phi}{\Delta t}
    $$

  • 範例：5000匝線圈，磁通0.01Wb增加到0.03Wb，0.5秒內，感應電勢為200V。

2. Advanced Problem: Self-Inductance and Current Change 進階題型：自感電感與電流變化

  • Parameters: inductance (L), current change (\Delta i), time interval (\Delta t).

  • Formula:
    $$
    e = L \frac{\Delta i}{\Delta t}
    $$

  • Example: 4H inductance, current increases from 2A to 7A in 2s, EMF = 10V.

  • 自感電感 (L)、電流變化量 (\Delta i)、時間間隔 (\Delta t) 用於計算感應電勢。

  • 公式：
    $$
    e = L \frac{\Delta i}{\Delta t}
    $$

  • 範例：4H電感，電流2秒由2A增至7A，感應電勢為10V。

3. Calculating Flux Change from Magnetic Flux Density and Area 利用磁通密度與面積計算磁通變化

  • Magnetic flux change:
    $$
    \Delta \Phi = B \times A
    $$

  • Example: 10 turns, magnetic flux density 2T, area 0.25㎡, time 0.1s, EMF = 50V.

  • 磁通密度 (B) 與磁極面積 (A) 乘積得磁通變化量：
    $$
    \Delta \Phi = B \times A
    $$

  • 例：10匝線圈，磁通密度2T，面積0.25㎡，0.1秒內感應電勢為50V。

Introduction

This article examines the magnetic force between two long straight conductors carrying current, including the calculation formula and practical examples with different scenarios.

Key Points

1. Basic Principles

  • Two long straight conductors carrying current exert magnetic forces on each other.
  • Force magnitude formula:
    $$
    F = \frac{\mu l I_1 I_2}{2 \pi d}
    $$
    where $\mu$ is permeability, $l$ is length, $I_1, I_2$ are currents, and $d$ is distance between conductors.

2. Force Direction

  • Same current direction causes attraction; opposite direction causes repulsion.
  • The direction of force can be determined using the right-hand rule for magnetic fields.

3. Example Calculations

  • Example 1: $I_1=10A$, $I_2=20A$, $l=10m$, $d=1m$, force is $4 \times 10^{-4} N$, attractive.
  • Example 2: Two wires 0.5m apart, current 20A, length 50m, force is 0.008N, repulsive.

引言

本文探討兩長直導體通電流時彼此間的磁力作用，包括計算公式和不同情況下的實際範例。

重點歸納

1. 基本原理

  • 兩長直導體通電流時，彼此會產生磁力作用。
  • 受力大小公式為：
    $$
    F = \frac{\mu l I_1 I_2}{2 \pi d}
    $$
    其中，$\mu$為磁導率，$l$為導體長度，$I_1, I_2$為電流，$d$為兩導體間距。

2. 力的方向

  • 電流方向相同時，導體間力為相吸；方向相反時，力為相斥。
  • 力的方向可用磁場的右手定則判斷。

3. 範例計算

  • 範例1：$I_1=10A$, $I_2=20A$, $l=10m$, $d=1m$，計算出力為 $4 \times 10^{-4} N$，方向相吸。
  • 範例2：電路中兩條線距離0.5m，電流20A，長度50m，計算力為0.008N，方向相斥。

entry.title: High School Basic Electricity: Inductance Calculations Part B - 高中基本電學：電感量計算 PART B
entry.content:
Introduction 引言

This article presents Part B of the inductance calculations series, focusing on basic inductance calculations with practical examples. It demonstrates how to calculate inductance using different formulas and parameters.

本文介紹電感量計算系列的B部分，重點在於基本電感計算的實際範例。內容展示如何使用不同的公式和參數來計算電感量。

Key Points 重點歸納

1. Example 1: Basic Inductance Calculation 範例一：基本電感量計算

  • Given parameters:

    • Number of turns (N) = 100
    • Current (I) = 10 A
    • Magnetic flux (Φ) = 0.2 Weber

  • Formula:
    [
    L = \frac{N \Phi}{I}
    ]

  • Calculation:
    [
    L = \frac{100 \times 0.2}{10} = 2 \text{ Henry}
    ]

  • 給定參數：

    • 匝數(N) = 100
    • 電流(I) = 10安培
    • 磁通量(Φ) = 0.2韋伯

  • 公式：
    [
    L = \frac{N \Phi}{I}
    ]

  • 計算：
    [
    L = \frac{100 \times 0.2}{10} = 2 \text{ 亨利}
    ]

2. Example 2: Inductance with Core 範例二：含鐵心電感量計算

  • Given parameters:

    • Cross-sectional area (A) = (10^{-2} m^2)
    • Length (l) = (10^{-1} m)
    • Permeability (μ) = (10^{-4} H/m)
    • Number of turns (N) = 1000

  • Formula:
    [
    L = \frac{\mu A N^2}{l}
    ]

  • Calculation:
    [
    L = \frac{10^{-4} \times 10^{-2} \times 1000^2}{10^{-1}} = 10 \text{ Henry}
    ]

  • Effect of halving turns:

    • New inductance = 2.5 Henry (1/4 of original)

  • 給定參數：

    • 截面積(A) = (10^{-2} m^2)
    • 長度(l) = (10^{-1} m)
    • 導磁係數(μ) = (10^{-4} H/m)
    • 匝數(N) = 1000

  • 公式：
    [
    L = \frac{\mu A N^2}{l}
    ]

  • 計算：
    [
    L = \frac{10^{-4} \times 10^{-2} \times 1000^2}{10^{-1}} = 10 \text{ 亨利}
    ]

  • 匝數減半的影響：

    • 新電感量 = 2.5亨利（原來的1/4）

3. Key Observations 重要觀察

  • Inductance is proportional to the square of the number of turns

  • Changes in the number of turns have a significant impact on inductance

  • Core material properties (permeability) affect inductance

  • 電感量與匝數的平方成正比

  • 匝數的變化對電感量有顯著影響

  • 鐵心材料特性（導磁係數）影響電感量
